title: HBO Max adds new ‘Shuffle Play’ button, but it’s not available on Apple TV yet
content:
Last year, Netflix brought a shuffle play button for when you don’t know what to watch next. Now, HBO Max has followed the trend, and it’s now offering a similar feature but for a limited number of shows.

more…

The post HBO Max adds new ‘Shuffle Play’ button, but it’s not available on Apple TV yet appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Last year, Netflix brought a shuffle play button for when you don't know what to watch next. Now, HBO Max has followed the trend by offering the same feature.
